sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { useForm } from "react-hook-form";
import { TextField, Box, Grid, Button } from "@material-ui/core";

export default function AddArticle() {
  const { register, handleSubmit } = useForm();
  const onSubmit = (data) => console.log(data);
  return (
    <Box px={4} py={2}>
      <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)}>
        <Grid container spacing={2}>
          <Grid item>
            <TextField
              required
              variant="outlined"
              name="title"
              label="Title"
              inputRef={register}
            />
          </Grid>
          <Grid item>
            <TextField
              required
              variant="outlined"
              name="writer"
              label="Writer"
              inputRef={register}
            />
          </Grid>
          <Grid item>
            <TextField
              required
              variant="outlined"
              multiline
              rows={3}
              name="content"
              label="Content"
              inputRef={register}
            />
          </Grid>
          <Grid item>
            <TextField
              required
              variant="outlined"
              multiline
              rows={10}
              name="body"
              label="Article Body"
              inputRef={register}
            />
          </Grid>
          <Grid item>
            <Button type="submit">add</Button>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </form>
    </Box>
  );
}
